title: Dependent Child visa
summary: This page provides detailed information about the Dependent Child visa (subclass 445), a temporary visa that allows a child to stay in Australia while their parent's permanent Partner visa application is processed. It outlines eligibility, costs, processing times, obligations, and visa conditions. It also explains sponsorship rules, health requirements, travel rights, and how long the child may stay.

structured_data.description: This visa allows a child to stay in Australia temporarily while the parent’s permanent Partner visa application is being processed.

important_updates.import_exceptions: Some applications made outside Australia before 1 April 2020 cannot be imported into ImmiAccount.

what_the_child_can_do: Move to or stay in Australia until the parent’s permanent Partner visa application is decided
Attend free English language classes under the Adult Migrant English Program if eligible

stay_conditions.allowed_stay_duration: Until parent's permanent Partner visa application is decided or withdrawn

structured_data.medicare_eligibility: Once granted the visa and added to the parent's permanent Partner visa application, the child can enrol in Medicare.

including_family_members.siblings: Each sibling must apply for their own subclass 445 visa.
including_family_members.dependent_children: Can be included in the child’s application when applying or before a decision is made.
including_family_members.health_requirement: All dependent children and possibly non-migrating family members must meet health requirements.
including_family_members.newborn_children: Specific steps apply if a child is born after lodging the application.

costs.pricing_tool: Visa Pricing Estimator (does not include additional costs)

apply_from.location: Child may be in or outside Australia when the application is submitted

notes: Times are indicative only and not specific to individual applications
Applications may take longer if incorrectly completed, missing documents, verification required, or incomplete payment
processing_times.payment_requirement: Application cannot be processed without full correct payment
communication: Department will contact if more information is needed
Final outcome will be communicated via authorised contact method

child_obligations.laws_and_conditions: Must meet visa conditions and obey Australian laws
child_obligations.application_requirement: Must apply to be added to parent’s permanent Partner visa application after visa grant

travel.travel_rights: Unlimited travel to/from Australia while visa is valid
travel.note: Time outside Australia does not extend visa validity

structured_data.visa_label: Visa is digitally linked to the child's passport; no physical label issued.

dependent_on_parent.no_further_stay_condition: Child cannot hold a visa with a 'No further stay' condition if applying inside Australia

conditions: One parent was an Australian citizen at the time of the child's birth

sponsor_requirements.sponsor_identity: Must be the same person who sponsored/nominated the parent’s permanent Partner visa
sponsor_requirements.approval_requirement: Sponsorship must be approved before the visa can be granted

registrable_offence_rules.pending_charge: Sponsorship and visa will be refused
registrable_offence_rules.conviction: Sponsorship can only be approved in limited circumstances

options: Over 18 and financially dependent on the parent holding a temporary Partner or Dependent Child visa

eligibility.health_requirements: Must meet health requirements (details truncated in the provided text)
